body:
Comment 2: 
You have dregs in src/pkg/old or src/pkg/exp that 'hg update release'
does not remove (because they're not managed by hg). If you clean out
that directory then switching between branches will work better. A
clean checkout should work just fine. Sorry for the trouble: Mercurial
doesn't really know what a directory is, sadly.

Russ
_Status changed to **Unfortunate**._
